summary: This project enhances MkDocs documentation with AI-driven features like automatic summary generation and intelligent reading statistics. It supports multiple AI services, generates high-quality summaries, and offers multi-language support. The system intelligently cleans content, provides fallback summaries, and includes a caching mechanism. Additionally, it offers precise configuration control and smart features like environment adaptation and content type detection. Users can install it directly or via Git clone, configure hooks, and select an AI service provider.
